Summary: Very Fast Pulsing Jet / weird pulsing type / not usual sound
trends: There have been no other sightings in Uhrichsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details i live out in the country so it's very quiet here , and we are not under or in any major flight paths . i do not usually hear high altitude jet traffic . in no set regular pattern i have heard what sounds like a jet type air craft sound . but this jet sound almost as if it's pulsing very fast ( not a steady roar or scream .) it usually always occurs at night midnight - 4 am. no set direction pattern and sounds as though it might be at 20,000 - 35,000 ft ( just guessing by what i have seen \ heard \ know about other aircraft that flies over area .) what is so strange is that from the very first faint sound of this sound it's flying very very fast !!! as from the first noticeable detection of it till it's gone is from 4 - 8 seconds . that means as if it's going from horizon to horizon or from edge to edge of audible sound detection . i have seen civilian and also spotted military aircraft that have flown over and tracked them with a scope and they last sight and or sound usually for 15 - 30 seconds . just seems like someone is testing \ has \ or is using some new type jet engine ( scram jet \ pulse jet etc ) the only visual sightings i have had is that some nights i have seen a object about the same brightness as a average star but traveling very fast horizon to horizon in 6 - 10 seconds ( no sound ) just a bit of info ( not related to anything i have said or reported ) in about early 2008 a man walked into the uhrichsville , ohio 44683 police station and reported that a lighted object flew above his truck and that his truck stopped \ stallled after the object left it started . he walked into the police station to make a report and they all started to laugh at him . at this point he left without making a report . this was a broadcast from one of out local radio stations news casts ?? jerry leskovec jleskovec@hotmail.com
